meanings.definition: The condition of having the ovary situated below the other floral parts.
meanings.sent1: In perigyny, the ovary is located beneath the petals and sepals.
meanings.sent2: The perigyny of the flower makes it unique in its structure.
meanings.sent3: The perigyny of the plant caused quite a stir among botanists.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a perigyny of colors, with the ovary hidden beneath the vibrant petals.
meanings.sent5: The perigyny of the flower stood out, with the ovary peeking out from below the other parts.
